mapper.select: SELECT a.EMPLYR_ID, b.USER_NM as USER_NM FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.MNGR_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNCMMNTYUSER (CMMNTY_ID, EMPLYR_ID, MNGR_AT, SBSCRB_DE, MBER_STTUS, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID) VALUES (#{cmmntyId}, #{emplyrId}, #{mngrAt}, SYSDATE, #{mberSttus}, #{useAt}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegisterId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.EMPLYR_ID) FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND b.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
